description:
Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality category.
  • Stacks.
name: Tanager Wreath
flavor: "Crafted out of bloody sticks and guts, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

description:
Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality category.

name: Devout Tanager Wreath
flavor: "Devoutly crafted out of bloody sticks and guts, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

description:

  • Stacks.
name: Ardent Tanager Wreath
flavor: "Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of bloody sticks and guts, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

description:
Grants 25% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories.
  • Stacks.
name: Hollow Shell
flavor: "An unidentifiable cocoon which was breached by whatever was inside."

description:
Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories.
  • Personal.
  • Stacks.
name: Survivor Pudding
flavor: "A heavily salted pudding…"

description:
Calls on The Entity to prevent the appearance of 2 chests.
  • Stacks.
name: Cut Coin
flavor: "Two halves of a thick metallic coin."

description:
Calls on The Entity to prevent the appearance of 1 chest.
  • Stacks.
name: Scratched Coin
flavor: "A defaced coin of unknown origin."

description:
Calls upon The Entity to Slightly decrease the distance between sacrificial hooks appearing in the world.
  • Stacks.
name: Moldy Oak
flavor: "A damp and decaying piece of oak replete with mold."

description:
Calls upon The Entity to Moderately decrease the distance between sacrificial hooks appearing in the world.
  • Stacks.
name: Rotten Oak
flavor: "A decomposing piece of oak in which strange markings have been etched."

description:
Calls upon The Entity to Considerably decrease the distance between sacrificial hooks appearing in the world.
  • Stacks.
name: Putrid Oak
flavor: "A ruined piece of oak oozing with a black putrescent liquid."

description:
Grants the ability to kill the last Survivor by your hand during the next trial.
  • Secret.
name: Cypress Memento Mori
flavor: "You worked well, the last one is yours."

description:
Grants the ability to kill one Survivor who has reached the second Hook State by your hand during the next trial.
  • Secret.
name: Ivory Memento Mori
flavor: "Grant me the favor of killing one."

description:
Grants the ability to kill all survivors who have reached the second Hook State by your hand during the next trial.
  • Secret.
name: Ebony Memento Mori
flavor: "I could swear It spoke to the beast. It came to a halt, as if calmly listening to the leaves rustling, and then… grinned."

description:
All survivors start the trial separated.
  • Secret.
name: Shroud of Separation
flavor: "A thin black shroud which is falling apart."
